committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to disclaim all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain private lands conditionally relinquished to the United States under the Act of June 4, 1987 ( 30 Stat. 11, 36), and for other purposes.

summary.text: Disclaims all Federal right, title, and interest in specified base lands over which the United States holds record title. Prescribes guidelines under which the Secretary of the Interior must: (1) prepare a list of such lands; and (2) acquire, condemn, or disclaim all Federal interest in them within a two-year period.

titles.title: A bill to disclaim all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain private lands conditionally relinquished to the United States under the Act of June 4, 1987 ( 30 Stat. 11, 36), and for other purposes.
